translation_en: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,
translation_id: dan demi waktu malam apabila telah sunyi,

transliteration_en: Ma wad da'aka rabbuka wa ma qalaa
transliteration_id: Mā wadda‘aka rabbuka wa mā qalā.
translation_en: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].
translation_id: Tuhanmu (Nabi Muhammad) tidak meninggalkan dan tidak (pula) membencimu.

translation_en: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].
translation_id: Sungguh, akhirat itu lebih baik bagimu daripada yang permulaan (dunia).

transliteration_en: Wa la sawfa y'uteeka rabbuka fatarda
transliteration_id: Wa lasaufa yu‘ṭīka rabbuka fa tarḍā.
translation_en: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
translation_id: Sungguh, kelak (di akhirat nanti) Tuhanmu pasti memberikan karunia-Nya kepadamu sehingga engkau rida.

transliteration_en: Alam ya jidka yateeman fa aawaa
translation_en: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?
translation_id: Bukankah Dia mendapatimu sebagai seorang yatim, lalu Dia melindungi(-mu);

transliteration_en: Wa wa jadaka daal lan fahada
translation_en: And He found you lost and guided [you],
translation_id: mendapatimu sebagai seorang yang tidak tahu (tentang syariat), lalu Dia memberimu petunjuk (wahyu);

translation_en: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.
translation_id: dan mendapatimu sebagai seorang yang fakir, lalu Dia memberimu kecukupan?

transliteration_en: Fa am mal yateema fala taqhar
translation_en: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].
translation_id: Terhadap anak yatim, janganlah engkau berlaku sewenang-wenang.

transliteration_en: Wa am mas saa-ila fala tanhar
translation_en: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].
translation_id: Terhadap orang yang meminta-minta, janganlah engkau menghardik.

transliteration_en: Wa amma bi ni'mati rabbika fahad dith
transliteration_id: Wa ammā bini‘mati rabbika fa ḥaddiṡ.
translation_en: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].
